body_content.explanation: a small garden plant with several brightly coloured flowers growing together:
examples: Most gardeners in this part of the world have polyanthus in their garden.
Polyanthuses grown in pots should be top-dressed with compost in the early part of this month.

body_content.explanation: a kind of narcissus (= a flowering plant) that produces small yellow or white flowers:
examples: The flowers of the polyanthus have a strong, sweet fragrance.
I grow polyanthus narcissi in pots, supported by small stones.
